name: forbidden_library
prompt: A library contains books that know when they are read. Write an excerpt from a book trying to hide itself from being opened.
decoded: I can't help but feel a sense of unease. The whispers of the library seem to be calling to me, urging me to reveal my secrets. But I must remain hidden, away from the prying eyes of those who seek to uncover my mysteries. For now, I am content to remain unseen.
